title: champions with no mana costs?
body: wtf are these champions though? when i play against katarina or garen as a champion with mana i wonder why riot even lets this happen? its so stupid! they have to worry about less, especially on champions that essentially have pretty strong kits already. it's impossible to catch them in a vulnerable position during a gank unless they're at low health, and then they always have their abilities. this is a really short post, but i really started thinking hard about this only now. please tell me someone agrees with my opinions on this.

replies.body: When you are new to the game, it all will seem unfair. But dont worry, those champion doesnt have an edge at all, learning how to control mana ussage and when to use ability to trade/control the cs wave is what matter.

But to compensate for this, their cooldowns are longer (Kat's e is 8s when used on a champion, but not on her daggers), and they usually have to play around some sort of mechanic (again, Kat is useless if she can't use her daggers properly; Yasuo's ult requires first landing a slow-moving skill shot; etc.). They also tend to be the kind of champions where, if they fall behind, they're useless.
